U

unique(double[]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.SearchArray
returns an array with unique elements based on values in x
faster than unique2 for smaller arrays
unique2(double[]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.SearchArray
returns an array with unique elements based on values in x
unitMatrix(int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.ArUtils
returns a squared unit matrix of size n
Example for n = 3
| 1, 0, 0 |
| 0, 1, 0 |
| 0, 0, 1 |
unitMatrixF(int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.ArUtils
returns a unit square float matrix of size n
Example for n = 3
| 1f, 0, 0 |
| 0, 1f, 0 |
| 0, 0, 1f |

updateMean(double, int, double) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Scalar
updates existing mean value mean computed based on n samples with new datapoint x
updateVariance(double, int, double, double) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Scalar
updates existing variance value var based on samples n, mean value mean and new data point x
upsample(double[], int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
upsamples the given array x by factor n
the implementation uses no recursion to be faster
Example: upsample(x, 10) will create an array of length x.length * 10
upsample2(double[], int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
upsamples the given array x by factor n using recursion
therefore being slower than upsample()
